description: minor (10 to 40 the bottom of the maelstrom’s funnel (1d4×10, 20, 50, or feet in diameter), major (41 to 120 feet in diameter), greater 200 feet, depending on the maelstrom’s size). A maelstrom (121 to 500 feet in diameter), and immense (501 feet to without an exit simply generates currents flowing away 2,000 feet in diameter).
